mapper.sql: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.CRS_CRE_CD , D.FORUM_SN , B.USER_NM , C.USER_ID , A.STD_NO , A.USER_NO , A.DECLS_NO , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_forum_atcl WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND FORUM_SN = #{forumSn} AND REG_NO = A.USER_NO ) AS ATCL_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_forum_cmnt WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND FORUM_SN = #{forumSn} AND REG_NO = A.USER_NO ) AS CMNT_CNT , NVL((D.SCORE),0) AS SCORE FROM tb_std_std A LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_lec_forum_join_user D ON ( A.STD_NO = D.STD_NO AND D.FORUM_SN = #{forumSn} ) , tb_usr_user_info B , tb_usr_login C WHERE A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO AND B.USER_NO = C.USER_NO AND A.ENRL_STS IN('S','C','F') AND C.USER_STS = 'U' AND A.CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND A.DECLS_NO = (CASE WHEN #{declsNo} IS null THEN A.DECLS_NO WHEN #{declsNo} = 0 THEN A.DECLS_NO ELSE #{declsNo} END) AND B.USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', NVL((#{userNm}),B.USER_NM) ,'%') ) A
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.CRS_CRE_CD , D.FORUM_SN , B.USER_NM , C.USER_ID , A.STD_NO , A.USER_NO , A.DECLS_NO , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_forum_atcl WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND FORUM_SN = #{forumSn} AND REG_NO = A.USER_NO ) AS ATCL_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_forum_cmnt WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND FORUM_SN = #{forumSn} AND REG_NO = A.USER_NO ) AS CMNT_CNT , NVL((D.SCORE),0) AS SCORE FROM tb_std_std A LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_lec_forum_join_user D ON ( A.STD_NO = D.STD_NO AND D.FORUM_SN = #{forumSn} ) , tb_usr_user_info B , tb_usr_login C WHERE A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO AND B.USER_NO = C.USER_NO AND A.ENRL_STS IN('S','C','F') AND C.USER_STS = 'U' AND A.CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND A.DECLS_NO = (CASE WHEN #{declsNo} IS null THEN A.DECLS_NO WHEN #{declsNo} = 0 THEN A.DECLS_NO ELSE #{declsNo} END) AND B.USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', NVL((#{userNm}),B.USER_NM) ,'%') ) A
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_lec_forum_join_user ( CRS_CRE_CD , FORUM_SN , STD_NO , SCORE , REG_NO , REG_DTTM ) VALUES ( #{crsCreCd} , #{forumSn} , #{stdNo} , #{score} , #{regNo} , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') )
